snippet.title: Mission: It's Complicated Trailer
snippet.description:
On Valentine's Day 2020, download this heartwarming visual novel about superheroes who try to save the world with love. Match pairs of superheroes and send them on missions at night and dates during the day. The more compatible your pair, the more likely they are to fall in love and stop the crisis that threatens the world. In this adorable PC-based narrative-based experience, the puns are terrible, but the feels are real. 

Available on PC for Windows and Mac, Mission: It’s Compli­cated has a total gameplay time that hovers between 8 – 10 hours. It takes between 2 – 3 hours to get to the conclu­sion of a single pairing. There are ten pairings in total.

Mission: It's Complicated is free starting February 14, 2020.

BUY THE GAME:
▸ itch.io: https://schellgames.itch.io/mission-its-complicated
▸ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1041210/Mission_Its_Complicated/

LEARN MORE:
▸ Content Creator Program: http://schellgames.grin.live/missionitscomplicated
▸ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Pugsly_MIC
▸ Who is Your M:IC Match Quiz: https://www.tryinteract.com/share/quiz/6025b0aede547d001765d5f6
